text: Michael Lawrence Renshaw (28 April 1948 â€“ 17 February 2021) was an English- American football left winger. He was born in Manchester, England. Renshaw began as a youth player with Blackpool before moving to the United States to join the Dallas Tornado of the North American Soccer League in 1968. He also spent time with Margate F.C. and Rhyl F.C. He made two appearances for the United States national football team in 1973. Renshaw died on 17 February 2021 in Dallas, Texas at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Blackpool F.C. players Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Footballers from Manchester Category:English football managers Category:American soccer players Category:American soccer coaches Category:Sportspeople from Dallas
title: Mike Renshaw
